00032 namespace lbann
00033 {
00034   class input_layer_distributed_minibatch : public input_layer {
00035   public:
00036     input_layer_distributed_minibatch(lbann_comm* comm, uint mini_batch_size, std::map<execution_mode, DataReader*> data_readers, std::vector<regularizer*> regs={});
00037 
00038     void setup(int num_prev_neurons);
00039     bool update();
00040     Mat* get_local_mat() { return &X_local;};
00041     CircMat* get_dist_mat() { return &Xs;};
00042 
00043   public:
00044     int m_root; /* Which rank is the root of the CircMat */

00046     CircMat Xs;
00047     long m_num_data_per_epoch;
00048   protected:
00050     void fp_linearity(ElMat&, ElMat&, ElMat&, ElMat&);
00051   };
